Thresholds.Name: Cat-like affinity
Thresholds.Description: Your burgeoning love for cats has allowed for this bonus to manifest.

Thresholds.Name: Cat-like reflexes
Thresholds.Description: Your reflexes are no longer like that of a dead cat. More like a live one. Or something like that.

Thresholds.Name: Dog-like affinity
Thresholds.Description: Your burgeoning love for dogs has brough this burden on you.
